Identities.Title: Razor's Edge
Incapacitated: One player may play a card now.
Until the start of your next turn, increase melee damage dealth by hero targets by 1.

Identities.Title: Returning Spear
Identities.Innate Power: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck, or put 1 card from your trash into your hand.
Incapacitated: One player may play a card now.
Until the start of your next turn, increase melee damage dealth by hero targets by 1.

Identities.Title: Revenge
Identities.Innate Power: Discard a card. Search your deck or trash for Iron Retort and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
Incapacitated: One player may play a card now.
Until the start of your next turn, increase melee damage dealth by hero targets by 1.

Identities.Title: Reshape
Identities.Innate Power: Discard a card. If you do, draw 2 cards.
Incapacitated: One player may play a card now.
Until the start of your next turn, increase melee damage dealth by hero targets by 1.

Stress Hardening.text: If Quicksilver currently has less than her max HP, increase damage she deals to non-hero targets by 1. If Quicksilver has 10 or fewer HP, increase damage she deals to non-hero targets by an additional 1.

Mirror Shard.text: You may redirect any damage dealt by other hero targets to Quicksilver. Whenever Quicksilver takes damage this way, she deals 1 non-hero target X damage of the same type, where X is the damage that was dealt to Quicksilver plus 1.
Mirror Shard.on entry: When this card enters play, draw a card.

Combo Chain.text: The first time each turn that Quicksilver would deal herself damage to play a combo card, prevent that damage

Iron Retort.text: When Quicksilver is dealt damage, you may destroy this card. If you do, you may play a card.
Iron Retort.on entry: When this card enter play, draw a card and Quicksilver regains 2 HP.

Forest of Needles.text: Quicksilver may deal 6 melee damage to a target with more than 8 HP, or 3 melee damage to a target with 8 or fewer HP.

Liquid Metal.text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a combo and a finisher and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck. Quicksilver may deal herself 2 melee damage and play a combo now.

Mercury Strike.text: Quicksilver deals 1 target 2 melee damage, then 1 target 1 melee damage. You may play a finisher or Quicksilver may deal herself 2 melee damage and play a combo.

Vicious Memories.text: You may draw an extra card during your draw phase.

Test Subject Halberd-19.text: Quicksilver regains 6 HP. Immediately end your turn.

Guard Breaker.text: Destroy a target with 3 or fewer HP, or deal 1 target 3 irreducible melee damage.

Whispering Steel.text: Quicksilver deals 1 target 2 irreducible melee damage. You may play a finisher or Quicksilver may deal herself 2 melee damage and play a combo.

Coalescing Spear.text: Quicksilver deals 1 target 3 projectile damage. You may play a finisher or Quicksilver may deal herself 2 melee damage and play a combo.

Alloy Storm.text: Quicksilver deals 1 each non-hero target 1 projectile damage. You may play a finisher or Quicksilver may deal herself 2 melee damage and play a combo.

Malleable Armor.text: If Quicksilver would be reduced from greater than 1 HP to 0 or fewer HP, Restore her to 1 HP.
Malleable Armor.power: If Quicksilver has not dealt damage this turn, she regains 3 HP.

Frenzied Melee.text: Increase all damage dealt by 1. The first time a hero target would be dealt damage by a non-hero target during the villain turn, you may redirect that damage to Quicksilver.
